error.message: Call to deprecated method getStyleSheetsRemove() of class Drupal\Core\Theme\ActiveTheme. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to configurable_theme_libraries.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
